l:dependency.name: Google Metadata plugin
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin provides a basic framework for steps in a buildâ€™s lifecycle to attach JSON-serializable metadata to a build (as an invisible action).

l:dependency.name: Jackson-annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Core annotations used for value types, used by Jackson data binding package.

l:dependency.name: jackson-databind
l:dependency.l:description: General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

l:dependency.name: Joda time
l:dependency.l:description: Date and time library to replace JDK date handling.

l:dependency.name: Guava: Google Core Libraries for Java
l:dependency.l:description:
Guava is a suite of core and expanded libraries that include utility classes, google's collections, io classes, and much much more.
Guava has two code dependencies - javax.annotation per the JSR-305 spec and javax.inject per the JSR-330 spec.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-core
l:dependency.l:description: Core Jackson abstractions, basic JSON streaming API implementation

l:license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 2.1
